#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    char m[t];
    scanf("%s",&m);
    float a,b;
    cin>>a;
    cin>>b;
    float sum=0;
    int i=0,flag=0;
    while(m[i]!='\0')
    {
        if(m[i]=='L')
        {
            sum=sum+a;
        }
        else
        {sum=sum-a;}

        if(sum>=b || sum<=(-b))
        {
            flag=1;
            break;
        }

      i++;
    }
    if(flag==1)
        cout<<"NO"<<endl;
    else
        cout<<"YES"<<endl;


return 0;
}
